def_en: An album is a record with about 25 minutes of music on each side. You can also refer to a collection of songs that is available on a record, cassette, or CD as an album .

def_cn: （用于保存照片、邮票等的）专册，专辑簿
def_en: An album is a book in which you keep things such as photographs or stamps that you have collected.
